|| *Example* || *Description* ||
|| sum 1 2 || 1 + 2 ||
|| sum 1,sum 2 3 || 1 + (2 + 3), the same is: sum 1 (sum 2 3) ||
|| sum 1,sum 2,sum 3 4 || 1 + (2 + (3 + 4)), the same is: sum 1 (sum 2 (sum 3 4)) ||
|| (a*sum a 1) || function which make a + 1 for (a) parameter ||
|| (f*sum 1,f 2 3) || function with parameter f where f is a function with (num,num) parameters, example of this function is sum, mul, minus, div||
|| elist || empty list [] ||
|| j 1,j 2,j 3,elist || list [1,2,3], join 3 to empty list, result is list [3], join 2 to list [3], result is list [2,3], join 1 to list [2,3], result is [1,2,3] ||
|| (sum a b*a:1*b:2) || sum a b where a = 1 and b = 2 ||
|| (head l*l:j 3,j 2,j 1,elist) || result is num 3, head value from list ||
|| (tail l*l:j 3,j 2,j 1,elist) || result is list [3,2], tail values from list ||
|| pair 1 "one" || pair container for 1 (num) and "one" (string) ||
|| ... ||
